A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely loved this addition to the series! It showed how flawed the characters we love can be- while still giving them a place we can all root for!  We didn't get answers for all the questions the previous addition to the series posed\, however\, there is one more movie left and I applaud the gritty\, rough-and-tumble edge this movie had. 5/5
